comment: Since Wednesday was Did you know ? A piece of information that is worth sharing . Prof Bayyinah Bello with the facts , once again . ( Prof Bayyinah Bello has plenty of videos on youtube , just type in her name for other great videos ) <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Since Wednesday was Did you know ? A piece of information that is worth sharing . Prof Bayyinah Bello with the facts , once again . ( Prof Bayyinah Bello has plenty of videos on youtube , just type in her name for other great videos ) <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :time (s / since
                  :op1 (d / date-entity
                        :weekday (w / wednesday))))
      :snt2 (p / piece
            :mod (ii / information)
            :ARG1-of (w2 / worth-02
                  :ARG2 (s2 / share-01
                        :ARG1 p)))
      :snt3 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Bayyinah"
                        :op2 "Bello")
                  :mod (p3 / prof))
            :ARG1 (f / fact)
            :mod (a / again
                  :mod (o / once)))
      :snt4 (a2 / and
            :op1 h
            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1 (v / video
                  :quant (p4 / plenty)
                  :medium (p5 / publication
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "YouTube"))))
      :op2 (t / type-01
            :ARG0 y)
      :ARG1 (n3 / name
            :poss p2)
      :mod (j / just)
      :purpose (v2 / video
            :mod (g / great)
            :mod (o2 / other))
      :snt1 (u / url-entity))
